name: Lament ~ Incarnation of the Goddess
description:
A very special thanks to a friend for providing the bonus artwork.

SUMMARY
Every 100 years, a young girl is chosen to become the Holy Maiden of the country of Istra in order to pay tribute to the Goddess that tends to their land. However, after an incident where a heretic breaks this tradition, the Goddess is nowhere to be found.

--Now, hundreds of years later, the Goddess has come again.

GAMEPLAY
You have 8 weapon slots to choose from, each with their individual Attack, Defense, and Wait. Pick a high defense weapon at the right time to block an enemy's attack--or exploit an enemy's slowness with a weapon that can attack quickly.

Weapons can be upgraded and gain higher stats using experience gained from battles.

You can progress the story in any order you'd like. Make sure to rest up after you've  taken a great challenge!
